actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management

official_title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to offer farmers supplemental crop insurance based on an area yield and loss plan of insurance or an area revenue plan of insurance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require offering farmers supplemental crop insurance based on an area yield and loss plan of insurance.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation to offer farmers supplemental crop insurance based on an area yield and loss plan of insurance or an area revenue plan of insurance, and for other purposes.
